about_the_game:
2 Minutes to Die is a heart-pounding escape game where every second counts. You play as a boy trapped inside a sinister house, with only one objective: find the keys and escape before time runs out. But you’re not alone. A relentless monster is lurking, and it’s always coming for you.

Your only defense? Close your eyes. When you close your eyes, the monster stops moving. Every moment you’re eyes are closed buys you precious time to plan your next move, but don’t linger too long, or the clock will seal your fate.

Can you search the house, outsmart the monster, and escape within 2 minutes? Or will you be just another lost soul?

Features:

  • 2-Minute Survival Challenge: Quick, intense, and replayable gameplay.

  • Tense Hide-and-Seek Mechanics: The monster freezes when you close your eyes—use it wisely.

  • Key-Hunting Puzzle: Find and collect the keys scattered throughout the house.

  • A Race Against Time: Solve the puzzle, escape, or die trying.

Time is running out. Eyes open or closed—choose wisely.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Dual-core processor, 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
  • VR Support: Not applicable
  • Additional Notes: Runs on most basic systems, no special hardware required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-core processor, 1.5 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated sound card

short_description: You awaken in the dark, a cold shiver running down your spine. The familiar setting of your home feels eerily foreign. Something is wrong—terribly wrong. As you gather your senses, a wave of dread washes over you. Button 1: Ctrl, Button 2: Alt.
